equip_suit.name: Yunkui Tales
equip_suit.desc2: When using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, CRIT Rate increases by 4%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When having 3 stacks of this effect, Sheer DMG increases by 10%.

equip_suit.name: Woodpecker Electro
equip_suit.desc2: Landing a critical hit on an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases the equipper's ATK by 9% for 6s. The buff duration for different skills are calculated separately.

equip_suit.name: Yunkui Tales
equip_suit.desc2: When using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, CRIT Rate increases by 4%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When having 3 stacks of this effect, Sheer DMG increases by 10%.

equip_suit.name: Woodpecker Electro
equip_suit.desc2: Landing a critical hit on an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases the equipper's ATK by 9% for 6s. The buff duration for different skills are calculated separately.

equip_suit.name: Yunkui Tales
equip_suit.desc2: When using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, CRIT Rate increases by 4%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When having 3 stacks of this effect, Sheer DMG increases by 10%.

equip_suit.name: Yunkui Tales
equip_suit.desc2: When using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, CRIT Rate increases by 4%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When having 3 stacks of this effect, Sheer DMG increases by 10%.

weapon.name: Qingming Birdcage
weapon.talent_content: CRIT Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>. When the equipper launches an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the character gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Qingming Companion</color> effect, stacking up to 2 times and lasting 15s. On entering combat, immediately gain 2 stacks. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of the <color=#FFFFFF>Qingming Companion</color> effect increases the equipper's <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>8%</color>, and increases Ultimate and EX Special Attack <color=#FE437E>Ether Sheer DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>.

items.title: Basic Attack: Cirrus Strike
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:\nPerform up to five attacks forward, dealing <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.\nThis skill's Anti-Interrupt Level increases during the 3rd and 4th hit.

items.title: Basic Attack: Ink‐Veil Cloud Coalescence
items.text:
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
Deploy a Grand Tai Chi Formation, dealing <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.
When the skill ends, automatically launch the 5th hit of Basic Attack: Cirrus Strike.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

items.title: Basic Attack: Auric Array
items.text:
While possessing an Auric Ink Point: tap <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during Dodge: Nimbus Step, or hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
Deploy an array, continuously dealing <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.
When the skill ends, it automatically triggers Basic Attack: Qingming Eruption.
While channeling, continuously recover Adrenaline, recovering 7/s, for up to 3s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill, and enters the Vital View state.

items.title: Basic Attack: Qingming Eruption
items.text: Automatically activates when Basic Attack: Auric Array reaches the max duration:\nSpreads her wings to launch an explosive attack, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Special Attack: Shadow-Ignition
items.text:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Swiftly retreat, then attack forward, dealing <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.
While retreating, a Perfect Dodge can be triggered, but cannot be followed up with a Dodge Counter.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

items.title: EX Special Attack: Ink Manifestation
items.text:
With enough Adrenaline, press or hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady_Rp> to activate:
Charge continuously, and release <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady_Rp> to launch an upward wing attack, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.
While charging, incoming attacks are automatically blocked and will activate the upward wing attack.
If hit at the exact moment charging begins, it triggers a Perfect Block effect, negating the DMG and increasing the skill's Interrupt Level to match a Heavy Defensive Assist, and recovering 10 Adrenaline.
When an upward wing strike hits an enemy with a red flash or yellow flash, a Perfect Block can be triggered, negating the hit and increasing the skill's Interrupt Level to match a Defensive Assist and recovering 10 Adrenaline.
The Perfect Block effect can occur at most once every 0.5s.
If charged until flashing or when triggering the Perfect Block effect, the upward wing attack can be followed by an additional Talisman Attack.
After the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to launch EX Special Attack: Celestial Cloud Blitz - Break.
After EX Special Attack: Celestial Cloud Blitz - Break, and with enough Adrenaline, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady_Rp> to consume another 20 Adrenaline to launch EX Special Attack: Qingming Eruption - Break.
After using EX Special Attack: Qingming Eruption - Break and with enough Auric Ink Points, hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to quickly follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Auric Array</color>.
Character is invulnerable during the upward wing attack, and Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while charging.

items.title: EX Special Attack: Cloud-Shaper
items.text:
With enough Adrenaline, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Continuously charge up, channeling energy around enemies to deal DMG over time, up to a max of 2s, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.
Once fully charged or if interrupted, automatically trigger EX Special Attack: Ashen Ink Becomes Shadows.
At the moment the skill is activated, a Perfect Dodge can be triggered. After the Perfect Dodge, enter the Vital View state.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: EX Special Attack: Ashen Ink Becomes Shadows
items.text: Triggers automatically during EX Special Attack: Cloud-Shaper:\nWhen the energy orb appears and contracts, it deals <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Dodge: Hidden Cloud Technique
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:\nA quick dash dodge.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Dash Attack: Skybreaker
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:\nLaunch a forward rush attack, dealing <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.

items.title: Dodge: Nimbus Step
items.text:
When dragging the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick}, hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
Enter a high‐speed <color=#FFFFFF>Light as Air</color> state. While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Light as Air</color> state in Investigation Zone Mode, automatically collect from all resource pickup points within range.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Light as Air</color> state, use the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to steer. Release the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to stop.
Character is invulnerable at the moment this skill activates.

items.title: Dodge Counter: Banishing Blow
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:\nLaunch a series of attacks on enemies ahead, dealing <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Chain Attack: Auric Ink Rush
items.text: When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:\nRapidly dash forward and attack, followed by an explosive wing burst, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Ultimate: Qingming Skyshade
items.text:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Launch a barrage of wing attacks, then guide countless talismans to attack, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, Yixuan evenly redistributes the squad's HP.
After using this skill and with enough Auric Ink Points, hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to quickly follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Auric Array</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression
items.text:
With enough Technique Points, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Consumes 120 Technique Points to spread her wings, then guide countless talismans to attack, dealing massive <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.
With both enough Technique Points and Decibels, this skill triggers with priority.
After using this skill and with enough Auric Ink Points, hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to quickly follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Auric Array</color>.
Upon activating this skill, Yixuan evenly redistributes the squad's HP.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Core Passive: Grandmaster of Mysticism
items.text:
Yixuan gains extra Sheer Force based on her Max HP, with every 1 point of Max HP increasing Sheer Force by 0.1.
All <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color> Yixuan deals via her skills is Sheer DMG, ignoring enemy DEF and using her Sheer Force stat as the DMG Multiplier.
When Yixuan accumulates <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink Anomaly Buildup</color>, it uses an independent Anomaly Buildup gauge, and when triggering an Anomaly, she restores an additional 10 Adrenaline. This can trigger once every 10s.
Upon entering combat, Yixuan immediately restores all Adrenaline. In Investigation Zone Mode, this effect can only trigger once every 180s. Triggering a Perfect Dodge grants an additional 5 Adrenaline and can occur at most once per second.
When she consumes Adrenaline, Yixuan accumulates Technique Points, gaining 0.667 points for each point of Adrenaline consumed. With enough Technique Points, she can trigger an additional Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression. The maximum for Technique Points is 120.
The DMG dealt by Yixuan's Basic Attack: Auric Array, Basic Attack: Qingming Eruption, EX Special Attack, Assist Follow-Up, Chain Attack, and Ultimate increases by <color=#2BAD00>60%</color>.
After launching Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression, Yixuan gains one Auric Ink Point. She can spend an Auric Ink Point to launch Basic Attack: Auric Array.

items.title: Additional Ability: Auric Ink Undercurrent
items.text:
When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Stun</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Defense</color> character:
When a fellow squad member uses an Ultimate, Yixuan continuously recovers 2 Adrenaline for 10s. If Yixuan is switched out by a Perfect Assist, she automatically follows up with a lightning strike attack, dealing DMG equal to 225% of her Sheer Force and restoring an additional 5 Adrenaline.
EX Special Attack: Cloud-Shaper and EX Special Attack: Ashen Ink Becomes Shadows deal 30% increased DMG to Stunned enemies.
After activating her Ultimate, Yixuan enters the Meditation state, increasing her CRIT DMG by 40% for 15s.

items.title: Quick Assist: Cloudstream Shadow
items.text: When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:\nLaunch a series of attacks on enemies ahead, dealing <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Defensive Assist: Clear Sky Surge
items.text: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:\nParries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

items.title: Assist Follow-Up: Celestial Cloud Blitz
items.text: Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:\nQuickly dash forward and attack, dealing <color=#FE437E>Auric Ink DMG</color>.\nCharacter is invulnerable while using this skill.

ranks.name: Spiritual Path
ranks.desc: Upon entering combat, CRIT Rate increases by 10% and immediately gain 120 <color=#FFFFFF>Technique Points</color>.In Investigation Zone Mode, this effect can only trigger once every 180s.\nWhen any squad member lands a hit on an enemy, Yixuan automatically summons an extra lightning strike, dealing DMG equal to 50% of her Sheer Force and restoring 5 additional Adrenaline. This can trigger once every 6s.

ranks.name: Ward Off Misfortune
ranks.desc:
When an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> deals DMG, it ignores 15% of the target's <color=#FE437E>Ether RES</color>.
Triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Qingming Skyshade</color> extends all enemies' Stunned state by 3s. In a single Stun state duration, enemies can only have this effect applied once, and it does not stack with similar effects.
Additionally, when using <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression</color>, gain one stack of the <color=#FFFFFF>Condensed Ink</color> effect
 After <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Qingming Eruption</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Ashen Ink Becomes Shadows</color>, press the Basic Attack button, or after <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Qingming Eruption - Break</color>, press the Special Attack button to consume one stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Condensed Ink</color> and launch <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Endless Talisman Suppression - Break</color>, dealing DMG up to 1200% of Sheer Force.
Only one stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Condensed Ink</color> can be held at a time.

ranks.name: The One Path of Mysticism
ranks.desc: Activating an <color=#FFFFFF> Ultimate</color> grants one stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Tranquility</color>, up to a max of 2 stacks.\nFor each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Tranquility</color>, the next <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Cloud-Shaper</color> DMG and <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Ashen Ink Becomes Shadows</color> DMG increase by 30%.

ranks.name: Swift Yet Still
ranks.desc:
After using <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Qingming Skyshade</color>, gain a stack of the <color=#FFFFFF>Regulated Breathing</color> effect.
While under this effect, you can ignore the <color=#FFFFFF>Technique Point</color> cost to launch <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression</color> once. The <color=#FFFFFF>Regulated Breathing</color> effect ends after <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Endless Talisman Suppression</color> is used. This effect can only be gained once every 30s.
Only one stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Regulated Breathing</color> can be held.
Additionally, while in the <color=#FFFFFF>Meditation</color> state, Yixuan's Sheer DMG is increased by 20%.
